com.agenarisk.api.model

Class Model

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.agenarisk.api.model.Model
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDContainer<ModelException>, Storable

    public class Model
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDContainer<ModelException>, Storable
    Model class represents an AgenaRisk model that may contain a number of Bayesian networks, scenarios etc, equivalent to com.agenarisk.api.model.Model in AgenaRisk Java API v1.

      • getNetworks

        copy of ID-Network map

      • calculate

               throws CalculationException

        Throws:
